EmailTemplate.description: Email 2: CBA Webinar Subject A: Watch: How are FIs converging the channels? Subject B: Break down the banking silos and improve customer experience https://www.ncr.com/banking/connect-webinar/thank-you
EmailTemplate.name: 12-14-22 BNK CSP ABM Campaign Email 2.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Watch: How are FIs converging the channels?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: An increasingly digital-first culture is changing what consumers expect from their financial institution. From increased use of digital banking, to changing engagement in the branch, you need to adapt to deliver exceptional customer experiences. Watch a recent Consumer Bankers Association and NCR webinar to hear from U.S. Bank, Royal Bank of Canada and National Bank of Egypt on how they are responding to changing consumer expectations and reshaping the customer experience. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> Â© 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
